command: # Command: what the player enters to use your custom command
# Class: points towards the command's script
# Tags: used by the Help command to find specific types of commands. Example tags:
#  Console - system-level commands such as Help or Status
#  Campaign/Combat - this command only works in these contexts
#  A mod-specific tag - include your mod as a tag so Help can differentiate them! The console mod uses the "core" tag
class: so please don't use that tag in your mod

command: # Syntax: the syntax pattern for your command. <> denotes a required field
# Help: what the player is shown when they enter "help <command>". The syntax line will be shown by help as well
class: so you don't need to include it again.

help: Searches all star systems for specified conditions. Full (boolean) - search even planets you haven't surveyed (default `false`, sets survey level to FULL), Planet count - MINIMUM nr. of planets that the system needs to have (default 1), Conditions - a comma-separated, no-space list of planetary conditions that must be met e.g.: [habitable=2,ore_rare=1] at leats two planets that are habitable and one that has transplutonic ore
Debug version if the regular command, Contains print statements.
Finds systems in specified range (integer) of an entity (coronal_tap, derelict_cryosleeper, inactive_gate).
